name: PHASECardioidDirectivityModelSubbandParameters
desc: A data set that projects sound of a certain frequency outward in the shape of a heart.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a data set that projects sound of a certain frequency outward in the shape of a heart.

items.name: var frequency: Double
items.desc: A frequency in the audio spectrum where the pattern and sharpness resonate most.

items.name: var pattern: Double
items.desc: A shape that determines the direction of sound.

items.name: var sharpness: Double
items.desc: The amount that the shape overlaps with bordering subbands.
